meanings: [명사] (비평) criticism, (논평) comment, (책·영화 등의) review, (평판) reputation, (formal) repute [동사] (비평하다) criticize, (논평하다) comment, (책·영화 등을) review, write a review

vlive.korean: 성장 평을 해보신다면? Can you tell us how different you are now? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#314. 룽이와 붐붐 (w. NCT DREAM)

vlive.korean: [질문을 이해하는 것부터가 난관...] - 평... 그러니까 넓다고? - 넓이가? 강 중에? Pyeong... So, you mean it's big? - The length? Out of the rivers? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 이곳은 가평💜
vlive.english: Pyeong... So, you mean it's big? - The length? Out of the rivers?

examples.korean: The play got terrible reviews and quickly died a death. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 연극은 형편없는 평을 듣더니 곧 완전 실패로 끝났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The play got terrible reviews and quickly died a death. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bad reviews of her new book were very hurtful to her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 새 책에 대한 안 좋은 평들이 그녀의 마음을 몹시 아프게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bad reviews of her new book were very hurtful to her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her album has been getting good reviews. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가수의 앨범 평이 좋네. DARAKWON
examples.english: Her album has been getting good reviews. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Too often the strong silent man is silent because he does not know what to say, and is reputed strong only because he has remained silent. (Sir Winston Churchill) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대개 강하고 과묵한 사람이 침묵하는 이유는 무슨 말을 해야 할 지 모르기 때문인데, 그는 단지 말이 없다는 이유만으로 강하다는 평을 듣는다. (윈스턴 처칠, 침묵명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Too often the strong silent man is silent because he does not know what to say, and is reputed strong only because he has remained silent. (Sir Winston Churchill) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She gets pretty high evaluations[reviews] from her bosses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 상사들에게 꽤 좋은 평을 듣고 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: She gets pretty high evaluations[reviews] from her bosses. Add to Wordbook
